title: Mobil launches 50% post-consumer recycled plastic pails in India - PR Newswire
summary: Mobil, a global leader in lubrication technology, has launched an initiative to use 50% Post-Consumer Recycled (PCR) plastic pails for its lubricant products in India.  This initiative aims to reduce plastic waste, promote a circular economy, and advance sustainability goals. The company also highlights its commitment to reducing waste in its lubricant facilities, having achieved Underwriters Laboratories Zero Waste to Landfill, Silver Validation.
likely_naics_codes: ['325120 - Petroleum and Coal Products Manufacturing', '325991 - Other Basic Inorganic Chemical Manufacturing', '424710 - Petroleum Bulk Stations and Terminals', '424720 - Petroleum and Petroleum Products Wholesalers, Except Bulk Stations and Terminals']
greenwashing: The article does not present any evidence suggesting greenwashing, instead highlighting the company's commitment to sustainability and its efforts to reduce waste and promote a circular economy.
